meta.description: Media Roots is a citizen journalism project that reports the news from outside of party lines while providing a collaborative forum for conscious citizens, artists and activists to unite.

title: Media Roots Radio: Rehabilitating Cheney, Jan 6 QAnon Casualties, Getting Covid Pt 1 of 2
cleaned_text: Abby and Robbie discuss the bizarre liberal commemoration of January 6th that rehabilitated Dick Cheney and brought the cast of Hamilton to perform. In the second half of the episode, Abby talks about getting Covid and discussed with Robbie their general thoughts about the pandemic response, vaccinations and increasingly polarized debate over the last two years. Be sure to listen … Read More
